articles.title: Argentina Heads for Another Crackup
articles.description: As it fails to honor its reform commitments, inflation is soaring. Sound familiar?
articles.content: The resignation of Argentine Economy Minister Martín Guzmán on July 2 comes three months after he renegotiated his country’s $45 billion debt with the International Monetary Fund. The fund says the stabilization and growth program it worked out with ... [605 chars]

articles.title: Cristian Pavon Eyes Return to Argentina Squad After Atletico Mineiro Switch
articles.description: Pavon revealed his ambitions as he faced Brazil's media for the first time since joining the reigning Brazilian Serie A champions on a free transfer from Boca Juniors
articles.content:
Forward Cristian Pavon has expressed hope that his move to Brazilian giants Atletico Mineiro will pave the way for his return to Argentina’s national team.
Pavon made the comments as he faced Brazil’s media for the first time since joining the reigni... [1156 chars]

articles.title: Rory Darge says Scotland have more to come ahead of decider in Argentina
articles.description: Rory Darge insists there is “a lot more” to come from Scotland after they levelled their three-match Test series with a comprehensive 29-6 win over Argentina in Salta on Saturday.
articles.content:
Rory Darge insists there is “a lot more” to come from Scotland after they levelled their three-match Test series with a comprehensive 29-6 win over Argentina in Salta on Saturday.

articles.title: Tapes Captured Eichmann Saying What No Nazi Said
articles.description: The men who prosecuted Adolf Eichmann in 1961 had a 700-page transcript of taped conversations between Eichmann and fellow Nazi exile/Dutch journalist Willem Sassen in Argentina...
articles.content: (Newser) – The men who prosecuted Adolf Eichmann in 1961 had a 700-page transcript of taped conversations between Eichmann and fellow Nazi exile/Dutch journalist Willem Sassen in Argentina a few years prior. The transcript wasn't allowed to be used i... [1678 chars]

articles.title: Tottenham squad rejoice after Cristian Romero makes up with new signing Richarlison as Argentina and Brazil rivals put long-standing feud aside on first meeting at Spurs
articles.description: Cristian Romero put his long-standing feud with new Tottenham teammate Richarlison to one side on Saturday - much to the delight of the Spurs squad.Th
articles.content:
Cristian Romero put his long-standing feud with new Tottenham teammate Richarlison to one side on Saturday – much to the delight of the Spurs squad.

articles.title: Transfer News: Angel Di Maria Completes Switch to Juventus
articles.description: The Argentina winger will earn a reported salary of seven million euros during his season in Turin
articles.content:
Angel Di Maria has completed his move to Juventus after being released by Paris Saint-Germain at the end of last season, the Serie A club announced on Friday.
